page.title: 09EDUCATION IN BRYNNA.
page.content: THERE IS 1 PRIMARY SCHOOL IN BRYNNA AND 2 NURSERY SCHOOLS IN THE AREA. THERE ARE 180 CHILDREN IN THE PRIMARY SCHOOL AND 32 IN EACH OF THE NURSERY SCHOOL. {BRYNNAU C.P SCHOOL BUILT 1904 {WELSH PLAYGROUP ESTABLISHED 1981 {ENGLISH PLAYGROUP ESTABLISHED 1974 } IN BRYNNAU SCHOOL THERE ARE 6 CLASSROOMS 4 IN THE MAIN BUILDING AND 2 QUITE NEW CLASSROOMS OUTSIDE. IT IS THE BIGGEST BUILDING IN BRYNNA BUT NOT THE OLDEST. THERE ARE 6 TEACHERS AND 1 HEADMISTRESS CALLED MRS WILLIAMS. BRYNNAU SCHOOL IS MAIN PART OF EDUCATION IN BRYNNAU. {THERE ARE 4 MAIN SUBJECTS NAMELY MATHS {MIXED BAG,LANGUAGE AND READING.THOSE { {4 SUBJECTS LEAD UP TO OTHER WORK SUCH{ {AS ENGLISH WORKBOOK,SPELLNG CARDS, {PROBLEMS AND HANDWRITING. BY {EMMA JENKINS AND {VICTORIA THOMAS.
